content:
You're probably right, logging out and then logging back in should resolve the issue.

It's great to hear that you're being more mindful of your social media usage and setting daily time limits! That's a fantastic approach to maintaining a healthy balance between online and offline life.

Remember, it's all about being intentional with your screen time and using social media in a way that enriches your life, rather than controlling it. By setting boundaries and focusing on meaningful interactions, you're taking a huge step towards a more balanced and fulfilling online experience.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you're able to log back into your Twitter account without any issues and continue enjoying your more mindful approach to social media!
